Area_1_NPC_1_Revive: ^Light has disappeared all over the world
^and with it the life, until now though!
^How did you get me back here?
IDK: ^I think to know, I see within you a light
FROM: ^from the one who make this place dark and lifeless
^the light as chosen you to face this dark entity
^and bring life back into this world.
WSID: ^Try to use this power to interact with your surroundings
^they will surely know how to help you on your travel
DNGR: ^Yes, not everyone who lived here before were friendly
WHATHAPP: ^You used the light in your possession to bring me back to life!
SOL: ^Yes, you are the only one who has this power
^Try to use this power to interact with enviroment
^that way you can find who stole the light in the world.
THECHOSEN: ^but I'm here now because of you and your power
^maybe if you reanimate other skeletons like me
^you can understand more of what's going on!
WDYM: ^Not everyone who lived here before were friendly
